topic.title: How To's with the HP Cloud OS Object Service

body.p: Tasks are described as being performed by a user or administrator.

section.title: Tasks performed by users
section.p: The following Imaging service tasks are usually performed by someone with the user role.

section.title: For more information
section.p: Also see the Help topics that are available in the Operational Dashboard and Administration Dashboard. Website copies are available:
